title: Turning perceptions
creator_credit: Karlene Lynch, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Karlene Lynch found out when she was 21 that she had Turner’s Syndrome. Despite the agony of being infertile and the health difficulties, Lynch has led a happy and inspiring life.
creator_credit_for_label: Karlene Lynch, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
